"Xiera": "Xiera here! What did you learn from Ash and Kireek?"

"They say they came from planet Ragol, do they? That's not a planet known to Oracle...
They may have come from a different dimension."
"ARKS has had a number of reports about mysterious transfer devices that appear with an audible fanfare."
"When the destination shown is \"????\", that means that teleporter will take you to a mysterious world which we call a Parallel Area..."
"Maybe those Parallel Areas have something to do with it. I'll conduct my investigation from here."
